Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: RubberDux
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera after researching on line and decided this one was the best to suit the needs of the recipient.  It more than met expectations.  The package contained everything as advertised.  Ordering was easy and it arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: Prices went down after I purchased it
Reviews.Author: Yuki Wang
Reviews.Content: When I bought it, it was $616. But after 3 days, the price went down to be $516. However, the camera is good.
